tool.doc: Temictli is a trace generator. It will generate a trace from a configuration given as input. The configuration file has one line for each trace we want to generate. Each line has values separated by a ';'. The values must be in the following order: typeOfEvent1#typeOfEvent2;NumberOfEventType;NumberOfProducer;NumberOfLeaveProducer;OnlyLeavesProducesEvent(boolean);NumberOfEvents;ForceIndexCreation(boolean);Runs. Example: Event#State#Variable;20;101;100;true;1000000;true;10 Note that if indexing is activated in Framesoc, putting the ForceIndexCreation at false won't prevent index creation.
tool.name: Temictli
